Description: 1st year production, 1996 Peavey EVH Wolfgang electric guitar. Gloss black Basswood body with Ivory binding, beautiful Birdseye maple neck, ivory Schaller tuners (made in Germany), and two special wound Peavey EVH humbuckers. I'd give this guitar a 9.8 out of 10, superb condition for a 23 year old guitar. I'm the second owner. The guy I bought it from worked for Peavey at the time this guitar was made, he met Eddie and gained a wealth of knowledge from him. There is only very light pick surface marks where your hand usually lands, and there is one very tiny imperfection on the bottom of the guitar that I tried pointing out in the pics, but it's barley noticeable. This guitar comes stock, all original. It includes original tremolo arm and Peavey hard shell case, which is also in great condition, no broken hasps, only tiny marks from storage. This guitar was never gigged, by me or the 1st owner, never in a smoking household. All my guitars are hung on the wall in a temperature controlled studio to keep the necks a straight as possible. I've sold guitars on Ebay before and have a %100 seller rating, I never sell junk, no BS, I ship to withstand a war, you are getting a great guitar which will appreciate in value. I have a box ready to go, and based on the time, I can ship same day.
Title: 1996 Black with Ivory Binding Peavey EVH Wolfang
